content.detailedDescription: On 4/2013 @ 7:30pm  myself and my kids were playing outside, we noticed a airline jet. flying over head. my 4 year old son was asking about the the trail behind the jet. i turned to talk with him when my 8 year old little girl said " daddy what's that behind the plane?"  i looked and didn't see anything there so i asked her what it looked like. she told me it was a black dot that flashed a bright light... so i looked again and i saw what looked like a  beach ball size dark gray cloud about 100 yards behind the vapor trail of the plane. i explained to her it was probably just some clouds, then it flashed the brights  light i have ever seen. the light was a blueish white light alomost like the glimmers a diamond gives off. the flash lasted 1-2 seconds and the object went back to the dark gray color. when the flash stopped it went instantly dark it didn't dim or anything just on then off. soi grabbed my cell and by time i turned camera on it was gone.
content.summary: 500 ft behind plane ( black object bright flash)

content.detailedDescription: Thought at first it was a big bright star.  quickly realized it was sparkling.  with binoculars many colors were easily seen flashing/blinking randomly.  lights were very vivid, somewhat comparable to led's.  was visible for about an hour.  object slowly faded leaving the impression that it was moving away although its position in the sky changed little if at all.  we have never seen anything comparable or as unusual as this.
content.summary: Thought it was a bright star.....But it had sparkling colors

content.detailedDescription:
I went to camp and explore the lava flows, cinder cones, and volcano remnants in dona anna county, new mexico. (do not attempt to drive through the area without a good 4-wheel drive vehicle or atv and bring at least 1 gal. of water per person, per day) after spending the night at aden crater i went to demming, nm to get food and water. on saturday night ( sunday morning) while camping at kilbourne's hole, dona anna county, new mexico, i woke up to nature's call at approx. 1:15am. i have a tent set up in the back of my jeep for cold nights. i crawled out of the tent, grabbed my cell phone to see the time-1:19 am. the moon was half full 45 deg (approx) and setting to the west. the skies were clear. i decided to light a cigarette and look at the stars. i was camped inside the upper crater on a plateau just on the edge of the south inner rim. for approx. 20 min i observed (commercial aircraft and meteors had been seen earlier in the night) a commercial airliner flying nw to ne. i was facing the crater looking north with my head turned west to see the moon. i turned my head to the north looking at the stars when i noticed out of the corner of my eye a white light to the east just over the top of the crater's outer rim . as i turned to face the light, it grew in an instant to a large, brilliant, hovering orange-red plasma sphere with yellow and white outer plasma ring. the object was approximately 100-150 feet in diameter. the object actually lit up the walls of the crater near me slightly and cast shadows off the crater rim to the east as it's position was over the desert outside of the crater rim overpowering the half full moon to the west. i took a few steps toward my jeep and stood at the driver's side windshield by the driver side door looking over the roof. the object was approx. half a mile from my location approx. 2-300 ft elevation above the southeast crater rim. i was dumbfounded (and glad my jeep was there for cover) as the center two thirds of the object which appeared as a deep red and orange much like hot lava with the outer one third brilliantly ���white and shimmering like plasma, began to ascend very slowly. ���i observed the object for a few seconds trying to rationalize what i was seeing. i grabbed my iphone from my back pocket, switched the camera to video and tried to film the object. i hit record, tried to steady my hand on the hard to of the jeep, however the object started to ascend more quickly. as it ascended, the orange-red center of the sphere shrank and the yellow-white outer rim collapsed around it becoming a bright white spec in an instant. the object shot off at mind-numbing speed up, and to the east away from me.. i was only able to capture the object ascending for a few seconds, and what appeared to be out of the atmosphere. i took a few minutes to get a grip on what i had just observed...Looked around to see if it might reappear, however all was quiet as it had been before the observation. i noticed an airliner flying in over the horizon from southwest, waited for it to get overhead and decided to call it a night.
iphone can't upload drawings/sketches to this web-form.
this info with sketches sent to mufon new mexico
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed bright orange-red sphere (lava-like) with yellow/bright white plasma aura descend, hover, and ascend.

content.detailedDescription: My parents and i had spent the afternoon walking in the mianus river park in greenwich, ct one sunday afternoon in 1979. as we started down cognewaugh rd. toward stanwich rd., i noticed a bright white light in the northwest sky. it caught my attention because of its brightness and size and also because it seemed too early for a star to be out. it was nearing dusk but the sun had not set yet. i continued to watch the light out the back window of the car as we made our way down stanwich rd. toward town. the light appeared to be getting brighter and larger. at some point i described what i was seeing to my mother, who was riding in the front passenger seat. she didn't have any trouble spotting it and became equally, if not more curious than i was. after a few miles, we turned right on a winding road that took us to north street. don't remember the name of the road. anyway, this road connecting stanwich rd and north street had a lot of ups and down and sharp turns, yet we were able to continue tracking object. it almost seemed like it was following us. while travelling 3 or 4 miles down north st., we lost sight of the object a couple times, but whenever we picked it back up it was clearly getting larger, brighter and closer. it was about this time that we began to get a little excited because it did not appear to be a helicopter or plane with lights on it; instead, it was looking like a solid mass of very bright light.  at the end of north st, we turned left onto maple ave and went about 1/4 mile or so to our driveway. my father had been concentrating on driving, hadn't looked up or been interested in seeing what we were seeing, despite our increasing excitement. as soon as we pulled into the driveway, my mother and i hopped out of the car and immediately looked back in the direction of north street. that's when the craft -- a large glowing pinkish yellow-gray football shaped disc with a light rotating around it very fast -- came gliding slowly and silently right over the trees across the street from us (about an 80 degree angle), over the greenwich women's club and south in the direction of the boston post road. having just seen an actual spaceship at close-range, my mother and i jumped in the car and took off in the direction of the craft was going. at the end of our street, we took a left on the boston post road and sped about 1 mile to the top of put's hill, where we spotted the craft just above the treeline. my mother pulled into the parking lot of the shalom temple, where we got out and looked up in absolute amazement. we walked out to the sidewalk and watched as the craft slowly glided out from over the millbrook neighborhood, over the post road we were standing on and over the greenwich high football field. the ship was quite large, about twice the size of a c-17 perhaps. the whole ship was glowing but an even brighter light was rotating around it counterclockwise. as it crossed the post road it seemed to wobble just a bit. again, it was completely silent, which was just astonishing because of its size and how close we were to it. after passing over the football field, the ship shot straight up and out of sight in a split second. amazing. it was so fast that it was almost comparable to simply disappearing. there was just the faintest trace left behind of it going straight up.  the sun had dropped over the horizon somewhere back on north street before we pulled into the driveway, so the ship disappeared about 15 minutes post sun set. still plenty of light out. it was the kind of light, for example, that would have been enough to finish up a baseball game on a field without artificial lights. the umpire would be speeding things up with an ever-widening strike zone perhaps, but it was your textbook dusk lighting when the whole thing was over. after it disappeared, we rushed home and my mother called the greenwich police, who said their phones were ringing off the hook with sightings. they said several of their most senior officers had called to report seeing the craft up close and that they were just as awestruck as we were. that was that. never saw anything in the newspaper or on television. didn't hear anything at school. maybe a week later my mother had heard that she'd heard a local restaurant/hotel called the showboat was advertising something with a plane that had lights on it, possibly the same night. but we, of course, knew what we'd seen up close and while it was still light out. it was a solid object that seemed to be solid steel glowing yellowish pink with the light revolving around it -- nothing remotely like a plane or any other earthly aircraft. it was silent, enormous and disappeared vertically in a half-second right in front of us. my mother and i have brought it up to each other every once in a blue moon just to remember and shake our heads in astonishment again, but we both know that there's no point in trying to convince anybody that we saw what we saw. neither do either of us feel like we have a need to do so. i know i didn't talk about it to classmates because i was 13 years old and right in the middle of that awkward period in junior high school where you're trying to figure out where you fit in, etc. and was not about to announce to anyone that i'd seen an actual ufo.  well, not really a ufo -- it was a spaceship from another plant, no question about it.
content.summary: Fat brightly glowing pinkish-yellow-gray football shaped disc with light racing around the outside edge parallel to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: My nephews wife saw a large military plane hover for about 3 minutes making no sound. she had her cell phone and took a picture. she said it looked big and had 6 engines.... 2 pointing down. again it was silent. she went inside for a minute came out and it ead gone.
content.summary: My nephews wife saw a plane hover

content.detailedDescription:
I was 15 years old living in dallastown pennsylvania.  it was a saturday evening, myself and several friends were walking along the back streets north of the main road with a great view of the hills on the other side of the valley towards york.  i don't recall what got our attention but we watched several bright lights hovering and slowly moving around over the hills on the horizon.  at first we thought they were just distant airplanes with there landing lights on.  but, after watching them for over 30 minutes, we realized they were flying the same pattern over and over again.  the larger brighter white light would fly in slowly from the west to the east and hover in a certain spot.  a dimmer smaller light would come in from the east to west more quickly and at a higher altitude, then fly slowly as it got closer to the first light.  at some point when they got too close, the larger brighter light would fly off very quickly back to the west and the dimmer smaller light would shoot straight up and disapear.   the cycle lasted about 2 minutes each time with about 5 minutes in between.
we watched this continue over and over again.  it went on so long that we had time to get more neighborhood kids out there and even run into my house and get a camera from my mother, who didn't care as much about it as she did getting to sleep for work the next day.  
at this point there are about 6-7 of us kids watching these lights replay the same cycle repeatedly when 3 low flying helicopters flew over our town heading towards the lights.  they were close enough when they flew by that we could tell they were the big kind with two rotars on top but since it was dark i couldn't tell you what color they were.  each had a strobe on it which we could see as they went over the hills and formed a triangle around the area where the lights were.  the helicopter strobes hovered there about 10 minutes and the lights stoped coming so we all got disapointed thinking they scared them off.  but, just as suddenly as before, the two lights started there cycle again.  we took a bunch of pictures, most of hat rims, fingers, and friends joking around, the only one that turned out was just a blob of light.  
about an hour and a half after all of this started it ended with a final cycle of the pattern that was different from the rest.  this time, with the strobes from the three helicopters framing the scene, the brighter bigger light came in slowly from the west heading east and came to rest at a hover in it's usual spot.  the smaller dimmer light came in more quickly from the east heading west and at a higher altitude.  as it got closer to the brighter light, it slowed down.  then, we saw a small pulsing red light come out of the dimmer light.  the small pulsing red light connected with the larger brighter one.  at this point the dimmer light shot straight up as usual.  but, when the pulsing red light connected with the bright light, sparks like fireworks started shooting out of it and it darted off down and west.  it was very bright and startling, all of us jumped back, some had the instinct to run away a few steps, one girl even fell backwards.  we watched for another hour but the lights never came back and the helicopter strobes eventually left.  
the following monday, there were stories in the local paper about people in the area spotting the bright light with fireworks coming out of the back shooting threw the sky.  they were dismissed as meteor sightings.  the thing that never sat well with me was, the sightings in the paper matched the description of how the bright light looked at the end of the light show but the witnesses saw it on sunday around 5:15pm.  what we saw was on saturday around 7:30pm.  i can't explain what we saw that night, and although i looked many times, i never saw anything like it again.  i still have several newspaper clippings from that weekend today.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Dallastown, pa ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
The object was about 2000-3000 feet above us and traveling west at about 200-250 mph. it was a rectangular orange light with a white center. approxamately 30-40 feet in diameter that made no sound at all. nobody could make out a shape  , other than an orangish light that made no sound.  it was observed by any number of people that were at the old settlers festival in driftwood. we talked to several others that were in different parts of the campground that saw it and they were all mistified as to what it was . there were 6 of us in our camp that saw it , two of us are pilots. 
this light had no red or green wing lights nor any anti-collision lights that you would see on an airplane at night. it moved away about 7 miles in less than a minute then just blinked out. 15 minutes later it came back out of the west and made a turn and then moved away again to the west at the same speed(200+mph) and once again just blinked out of sight.
i am an airplane buff and proudly can identify any aircraft that i see ,but this was nothing that i or anybody else could indentify.
content.summary: Orange/white object , made no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a short cut back home around 5:00pm using an old logging dirt roaddirt
content.summary: Noticed craft hovering over abandoned farmhouse shed beaming bluish light onto trees, radio started crackling the i lost memory of event until i temember exiting the firt road..But it was 15 hours later.."

content.detailedDescription: I was looking up in the sky and saw a bright object that i assumed was a planet. as i was wondering what planet it could be the object brightened intensely, and i thought i might be seeing a supernova of a star. then the object wiggled and began to move generally from south to north as it dimmed. the object then brightened again like it had before and started moving in a straight line, again generally from south to north. the object dimmed again and i never saw it again. i have seen planets in the sky all the time and have seen satellites when in less light pollution areas while camping etc.. the only way i can describe the distance the object moved is to hold you hand at full arms length away at the sky and make the space between your thumb and forefinger about 4 inches. this object seemed to be very high( probably in space in my opinion). the sad thing is i had my iphone in my had the whole time and it never once occurred to me to film it. i'm not saying it was an alien craft but the fact is i don't know what it was and have never seen anything like that in my life.
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a planet, the the object brightened and i thought i might actually be seeing a supernova, then the object wobbled, dimmed, brightened again, moved in a straight line, dimmed and i never saw it again.

content.detailedDescription:
No ufo sighting...

...[copy from personal x-file diary] a few nights after all these happenings, i sent out a mental message for direct alien contact, meaning no space-craft, just the physical entity; as i was taking out a bag of trash to the apartment building's dumpster. as i began to toss the bag of trash over the fence-gate, i seriously mean as i was about to do this action, i saw a black hole gaining larger in size, i knew i was going to meet a being of another species not of my own. now, i finish tossing the bag of trash over the top and turning-around; i told my self verbally to remain phunking calm and do not let my mental-gaurd-walls to be lowered down at any time for my selfish sanity.
it look-a-like a biped being with arms, humaniod form. its skin was dark as it insisted on standing in the shade, out of the security lights from the aparment building where i resided. so, the skin texture was not clearly visual once it got into the shaded area. it may have scalely or reptilian apearance by skin, hands, and feet. if it had a tail, i could not remember for my life's sake, because i refused to let myself stir into its wholesomeness, including the fact its lower area of where the tail could exist, was in the darkest zone of my parking lot and landscape. it could have claws at the end of it's fingers, but i stood further back, as i was beginning to friegten my self for its intentions were unknown to me. i had a flash-back of a episode of oneof david ickes's presentations. got me thinkning that this was reptiliian in nature. when i decide to walk, i moved in way that a feline would its pray, but my target was reaching indoor of my apartment for self-security. i was alone, so i got scared. i thought i was brave enough for any entity. once i got inside my apartment, i knew there would be no one to talk to about it. it was very late at night, about 2:30am - 3:30am. i decided to meditate to calm my self. it worked. after the encounter, i knew i wanted a pet, such as a pet i have been trying to get my landlord to allow me to obtain since i moved into it. though i knew after five years to change their minds, i moved-out and into the apartment building where i reside now.
content.summary: No ufo sighting.

content.detailedDescription: It was approximately 8:20p.M.On sunday april 21st,2013 when i raised the blind on my south facing window,as i do most nights.My attention went almost immediately to a "star" as it was brighter than most and the light emitted was of varying intensity & appeared to almost vanish when it dimmed.Object was at roughly a 10 o'clock position in my field of vision when first seen.By 8:45p.M.,item was in a 2 o'clock position.The lateral movement was inperceptable.At 8:32p.M. a helicopter heading north on usual flight path,following us interstate route 93 passed below & to the east of object.At 8:34p.M.,an aircraft travelling east passed through my field of vision & appeared to be below the object.I watched intently,as i dressed and headed outside to continue watching object.I smoked a cigarette under the cover of some evergreen trees,which blocked the light of the moon and the nearest streetlamp.At 8:43p.M.,i was back in my bedroom,and it was then that i became aware of the objects actual lateral movement,as object was now behind the branches of the evergreens.I looked at the clock,it was 8:50p.M. & i could no longer see the object through the trees. i was hesitant to learn how and where to report this & were it not for the helicopter & aircraft in the sky as i watched this object,i most likely wouldn't be writing this note.I am curious as to whether anyone else saw this object.Were it not for points of reference,(my window frame & the trees)i'm not sure that i would have continued watching object for a half hour.
content.summary: Noticed what seemed like a star with varying degree of light intensity.

content.detailedDescription:
Between christmas and new year of 2012 i went outside my apartment in san mateo california to empty the garbage. upon returning to the apartment unit i looked up at the sky and spotted what appeared to be a meteor or shooting star entering the atmosphere from the east. as it came in from an angle it changed and was parallel with the ground. i thought to myself that this is not a meteor or shooting star. i continued to watch it move north westerly, disappear behind the roof of the house next door and reappear on the other side. i walked in the same direction  to get a better look. it stopped in a north westerly direction. it was shaped like a sideways ice cream cone with oblong lighted windows covering the entire object from left to right and up and down. there was about four or five rows of these very long oval windows. the object was very flat in the front except for a very bright light which created an immense arc of light. hearing a noise to my right, i gazed in that direction. when i returned to look at the object it had disappeared.

i just checked my compass readings to make sure about the direction.

i could not believe my eyes that this was the second sighting in a month since seeing another sighting outside of lovelock, nevada in november.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 10 seconds at most from entry to disappearanace.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 10 pm in 1985, ashland wi. my friend and i were talking and notice a dark in color, bright red light hovering the lake. it was off in the distance so it was hard to see any real shape besides a sphere shape to it. so, it was hovering then begain to slowly move westward. guessing maybe a quarter of a mile. it stopped and hovered for a small amout of time. it then very quickly, shot staight up, about four inches from where we were standing. then hovered very briefly, a second maybe and darted off to the east with a tail, in a forty five degree angle and just kinda desovled, vanished. i'm a fan of planes and helicopters and i've never seen anything move like that. i was in awh. since that moment, i find it hard to believe that our planet is the only one with life in the billion of stars that are out there.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighting was almost word for word with chuck clark's sighting, documentary " ufo's 50 years of denail". object looked and moved like the documentary.

content.detailedDescription: solid orange lights (5 one after another) moving steady, then up 4 went ahead and 1 followed going up and down across the sky. no sound.
content.summary: Five orange lights observed traveling sw--no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my home and i just finished watching ancient aliens. when the episode finished i was left thinking how can people get so lucky to have have ccidental encounters weather it be any of the five kind. so i grabbed my digital camera and went out side to see if i could get lucky.It had just stopped raining and the skys were still clouded i picked a spot in the sky and started to record. i knew if i couldn't see anything with my eyes it didn't mean i could catch anything on video since cameras can see parts of the light spectrum humans can't. i watch my video and saw nothing....Until i went back and did a frame by frame what i saw stunned me. at first i tried to de bunk it maybe it was a plane or a bug to close to the lens and for all this time i watched did research and tried to grasp if it was truly a u.F.O.It moved so fast in that one instant that it was in frame and out of it in less than a second.It made me happy that i may have got my very own clip and on purpose!
 at the same time i felt small like we are not the biggest thing in this universe.I just wish it was moving slower so i could have had a longer video.I hope you mufon can use ur resources to analyze the video and get to the bottom of what i recorded.
one more thing i don't have a laptop so i can't upload the video i'm filling this out on my cell it would be cool if u had any field agents that can come and get a copy. also this wasn't the first time i saw the object the second time was on a clear night about a month and a half ago  when the moon was full and just leaving its highest point in the sky i raised my hand reaching out to the moon when i saw the object fly by but at a much higher higher altitude this is when i new i was seeing things or really seeing something im looking foward to hearing back from you. my cell is on hear i don't answer numbers i don't know so if you could please leave a voice mail and call again in ten min if i don't pick up or email me. 

                   sincerely: roberto lavalliere


p.S . i have the exact date on the video file but i'm sure i am close on the date. best times to reach me are tuesdays wednesday friday or any day if the week after 7:30 pm.
content.summary: Blink and you will miss it

content.detailedDescription:
Outside wellton, az,summer of 1975, my brother and i were outside smashing aluminum cans. we both were suddenly aware of a hockey puck sized ufo hovering very close by as if watching what we were doing! we kept looking at it, trying to figure out if it was some sort of weird bird or huge insect as it hummed, almost like the noise that a hummingbird makes. it was no hummingbird. it was shaped like a hockey puck (round), a black/dark grey dull surface, that was not smooth looking. it looked like the color of a gun barrel but not as smooth. the object hovered, moving smoothing toward us, then backward, it moved quickly back and forth, left and right. i was slightly fearful, unsure of what it was and afraid it might hurt us. my brother started throwing rocks at it, trying to knock it out of the air. it never landed the entire time we observed it. the object easily avoided being hit, zipping away, then back again almost as if playing with us! it never emitted any lights of any kind, it simply hovered, slightly humming/buzzing as it did. this went on for over 15 minutes, literally, as we tried to knock it out of the air! as we started moving closer each time, running at the object and throwing rocks, it took off quickly, flying low through the desert floor, easily avoiding the native brush and bush as it flew. it came back three times. each time, moving so fast, it was very difficult to keep track of all at once. the last time it flew off, it flew low, and then upward, quickly disappearing into the sky. 
a few months later, i can't remember the exact date, i was alone, biking home from a friends house, about half a mile from home and the object, exactly the same as before, flew up beside me as i rode my bike, moving easily with me along the road. it hovered around a foot from my face. i was terrified! i tried to go faster but it (of course) easily stayed with me. it did not do anything but simply hover/fly along with me as i biked home. again, it was like it was observing me! i will admit that this encounter freaked me out considerably as i was alone, still a substantial way off from my home. i did not feel safe at all. i put my head down and rode that bike as fast as it would go, refusing to look at the object any longer. i don't know exactly when it took off, but when i got to the driveway and looked up, it was gone.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Hockey-puck size, seen by myself and brother while smashing cans outside, it seemed to observe us, darting up, down, left, right, in between bushes, as close as ten feet away. we threw rocks at it, but it easily moved to avoid contact.

content.detailedDescription: On april 19,2013 ,i was out side in my front yard enjoying the night sky with my dogs.It was about 8:50pm it was time for us to go inside, as i was about to put the dogs back in the house. i noticed a bright flaming light bigger than the stars. it appeared in the east side of the sky, i then quickly ran inside to get my iphone to video tape it. when i got back the object was going ne direction, i videoed the object till it was just out of sight. this was not a falling star this object had direction.
content.summary: Bright flamming red light ,comming from eastern skys and moving towards ne

content.detailedDescription: My wife and her friend where watching the kids swim in the pool on a clear day no clouds when they noticed a huge gray triangular object hovering in the distance. they both did not understand what it was and never seen anything that could stay still in the air it was larger then a 747 and made no noise. my wife ran inside to grab a camera and came back out and was about to take a pic when it moved for a second then disappeared. my wife is a teacher and her friend never told me about it until yesterday.  she said they did not want to tell anyone because no one would believe it.
content.summary: Very large triangular gray object that was stationary during the day clear skies  by dte 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
Well, i went outside to smoke. i looked up and noticed two large orange and reddish glowing orbs heading north. they both seemed to have a particular pattern. they would stop and hover for a minute or so then continue in the same direction. i ran into the house and got my wife to see it. she did not really know what to say about it. the orb at the furthest distance from me abruptly left out of sight, as the other sort hovered in one spot then soon followed. i thought it was all over.... i came back outside five minutes later and there where two more of the same orbs, following the exact same pattern as the last two. again i ran inside to get my wife. the only different that happen this time is the one furthest away this time suddenly dropped. i mean it completely dropped from sight. the second it dropped the other orb stopped and sat in one spot. it stayed there for about five minutes then took off. honestly i have very good eye sight and could see it leave from a very far distance. before it vanished it resembled a bright red star. i don't know what else to say except wow.

p.S. i got 1 bad picture but you can see the orb as a ball of flames.

and it just so happened that my camera malfunctioned after taking the video. there was no video when i put the sd card into the reader.... my camera just went on the frits for some reason.

i attached the photo. zoom in.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Glowing orange orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home with a friend and the bright orange light caught our attention.I was curious at first then quickly realized this was not normal.It moved vary slow laterally then picked up speed moving up and then down then disappeared.It lasted about a minute and a half.The light was larger than any light that would have been on a plane or helicopter,and the wrong colour.We are past chinese new year,i don't think it was a lantern. too big and too high.
content.summary: The globe looked close,stopped,changed direction 3 times then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I had a weird experience on dec. 21st, 2012.  i had a drink before i went to bed and was feeling mellow.  six hours later i awoke incredibly afraid.  i awoke thinking we were having an earthquake but instead i found that i was being rocked from side to side violently to the point of nearly flipping over.  my body was totally relaxed yet my body was being lifted quite a bit off the mattress.  i laid there just observing (really wondering "what the hell") was going on.  the action started to quell as i reached out with my hands trying to grab the sheets to stabelize myself.  i looked around the room and noticed  a swirling in front of me.  the mass was rotating in a clockwise direction and then froze in position.  so now i was still looking at it with the door bent along with the rest of the room and its furnishings in that area all frozen in this clockwise position in that whirling mass.  i could see streaks where the objects moved from as though one had taken a picture of a fast moving object.  i turned to look at my husband sleeping.  everything was fine with him and everything on his side of the room was fine too.  i looked in front of me but nothing had moved back into place yet everyting to the sides of this whirling were fine too.  i was completely shocked.  i moved my body and head but the room stayed as it was.  i was getting pretty worried now because i have experienced a similar thing in which i absolutely couldn't wake my spouse no mater what i did.  i got up and went to the kitchen to get a glass of orange juice.  i walked past the frozen objects.  i thought "what the hell happened in there".  i thought, "i feel ok,that couldn't have been real"".  i walked back.  everything seemed ok.  when i got near the bedroom i felt this rotation again and my body was being pulled from side to side bouncing off either side of the small hallway.  i was being rocked again and i was rocked hard into the walls on either side of me and had to block the action by thrusting out my arm to support myself and block some of the blows.  this only happened near the bedroom where the vortex took place.  the whole physical senation was completely different in this area.  every place else in the house seemed fine.  everything in the bedroom had finally oriented itself correctly.  i ran and threw myself into bed, closed my eyes, and hoped nothing else would happen.  i talked to a trusted person in my temple and he thought that i was going through some type of a vortex.  no i've never taken drugs.  i take pictures of orbs outside here all of the time. not too long after this i saw an orange orb in the house and i've never had these things in the house.  there are so many other photos that i don't even want to get into. seriously does anyong have any knowledgable input on this? i didn't make a sketch but picture a 10' or so clockwise swirling mass in front of you that seems to have taken into it the rooms door and furniture that are directly in back of it.  these items are swirling in it in a fluid manner, this object stops swirling but the objects now show streaks on their bottoms left making them look like they are moving very fast but they appear to freeze in time. the date that this happened was dec. 21st or 22nd.  i'm leaning toward the 21st.
content.summary: Swirling mass nearly 10' wide moving in a clockwise direction in front of me

content.detailedDescription: I had a weird experience on dec. 21st, 2012.  i had a drink before i went to bed and was feeling mellow.  six hours later i awoke incredibly afraid.  i awoke thinking we were having an earthquake but instead i found that i was being rocked from side to side violently to the point of nearly flipping over.  my body was totally relaxed yet my body was being lifted quite a bit off the mattress.  i laid there just observing (really wondering "what the hell") was going on.  the action started to quell as i reached out with my hands trying to grab the sheets to stabelize myself.  i looked around the room and noticed  a swirling in front of me.  the mass was rotating in a clockwise direction and then froze in position.  so now i was still looking at it with the door bent along with the rest of the room and its furnishings in that area all frozen in this clockwise position in that whirling mass.  i could see streaks where the objects moved from as though one had taken a picture of a fast moving object.  i turned to look at my husband sleeping.  everything was fine with him and everything on his side of the room was fine too.  i looked in front of me but nothing had moved back into place yet everyting to the sides of this whirling were fine too.  i was completely shocked.  i moved my body and head but the room stayed as it was.  i was getting pretty worried now because i have experienced a similar thing in which i absolutely couldn't wake my spouse no mater what i did.  i got up and went to the kitchen to get a glass of orange juice.  i walked past the frozen objects.  i thought "what the hell happened in there".  i thought, "i feel ok,that couldn't have been real"".  i walked back.  everything seemed ok.  when i got near the bedroom i felt this rotation again and my body was being pulled from side to side bouncing off either side of the small hallway.  i was being rocked again and i was rocked hard into the walls on either side of me and had to block the action by thrusting out my arm to support myself and block some of the blows.  this only happened near the bedroom where the vortex took place.  the whole physical senation was completely different in this area.  every place else in the house seemed fine.  everything in the bedroom had finally oriented itself correctly.  i ran and threw myself into bed, closed my eyes, and hoped nothing else would happen.  i talked to a trusted person in my temple and he thought that i was going through some type of a vortex.  no i've never taken drugs.  i take pictures of orbs outside here all of the time and one was previously shown in these files. not too long after this i saw an orange orb in the house and i've never had these things in the house.  i've taken a picture of a spirit in the front yard that made its image plain.  seriously does anyong have any knowledgable input on this? i don't have a sketch but just picture a very large clockwise swirling mass in front of you at least 10' wide with the rooms door and the immediate furniture swirling and bent going in the same clockwise direction in a very fluid movement then having them stop in place or freeze, if you will, with motion streaks staying in place to the bottom left of each object.  imagine everything to the sides of it are as normal as could be and functioning normally. this event happened on dec.21st or 22nd 2012.  i'm leaning toward the 21st. i don't know what colour it was because the room was dark and only a night light was on.
content.summary: Swirling mass controlled me physically

content.detailedDescription:
At 5 am i was setting on the edge of my bed looking out my window to th northwest.  earlier i was admiring the huge bright moon while it slipped below the tree line.
 
as i was taking a pill i looked up and saw 2 lights, shaped oval, hovering over an old bomarc missile base about a mile or so to the northwest, just appear out of the darkness.
 they just hovered there for about a minute not changing color or shape.
 
i awoke my wife to see these lights, and just as she moved to see out the window they started moving to the east.  they made no noise and the clear white light just kind of flickered slightly.  they moved off to the east from the point i first saw them.
 
now i am a pilot with over 1200 hours in my log book and, who's father was a navigation tech. with both the usaf and with the federal aviation admin.  i grew up around loring afb and the presque isle airport (along with many nav sights in northern maine).
 
my point here is these lights were between me and the bangor vor, which sits a few miles off the north end of bangor international airport.
 there were no strobe or anti collision  lights, no wing position lights, a red light should have been visible as they were approaching me and the left wing would have a red light marking it.   as i said earlier, there was no sound at any time.  the lights were about 2 to 3 football fields apart from the time the appeared until they moved out of my sight.
 
i see aircraft flying over and around home most every day.  bia is the home of the 101st air refueling wing, flying kc 135 stratotankers, which make a huge noise on take off and cruising overhead.   also we have a helicopter unit stationed here, flying uh 60 blackhawks, which are also noisy.
 
the lights approached no closer than  2 football fields near me.  i saw no other lights or aircraft in the sky.
content.summary: Oval shaped lights move indark north then e to ne

content.detailedDescription:
From the casco bay bridge waiting as the drawbridge allowed a ship to pass. observed from the ne horizon 2 separate lights/craft with star like qualities approaching portland and ascending. i observed from approximate distance of 5 statute miles. 1st 2 lights were in twin formation but wove slightly toward and away from each other, their formation was akin to fighters. their ascent to approximately 2-3 thousand feet disappearing into possible cloud cover not to reappear. 
the second 2 lights looked and behaved identically and appeared approximately 2-3 minutes after the 1st pair disappeared. 2nd set of lights also intermingled slightly as they ascended and disappeared into possible cloud cover at 2-3 thousand feet. 
the last object also portrayed identical star like qualities approaching from the ne once again and ascending then disappearing into possible cloud cover at 2-3 thousand feet. 

all objects possessed star like qualities with a prominent yellowish light like a landing light on a commercial aircraft. objects were observed over the total of approximately 10 minutes and disappeared as they ascended above casco bay to the ne possibly above falmouth. all objects appeared from the same location on the horizon from the ne. 

no sound was observed due to my location in an urban area and the relative distance of myself from the objects. their speed may be approximated at 100-300 mph as they approached and ascended smoothly without acceleration or sudden movement. speed was constant and similar to a slow fighter jet. the objects did not pause, stop or change direction drastically.
content.summary: 5 sets of lights from ne acending. 2 pair and 1 trailing. all ascended & disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were traveling west on a street about three miles north of amarillo, tx.  as we were about to approach a stop sign at an adjacent street, my son asked, "do you see some lights ahead  of us?"  i looked and did not see lights.  i said no i don't see anything.  he then said while pointing, over there (toward the northwest).  i looked again and i did see them approximately a quarter to half mile away.  we then proceded to cross the street that we were stopped at and get a better look.  we drove about a
quarter of a mile until we were almost due south of the objects.  we did not notice any movement at all. they appeared stationary.  we did not witness any change in the lights intensity while watching them.  i looked for evidence of aircraft, but there were no other lights blinking, or flashing.  there were 8-10 of these orange lights arranged in a very narrow area in the sky.  there was no real pattern to the arrangement of the lights other than they were more or less scattered in a narrow vertical area.  once we came to a stop to take a picture, they slowly moved into a cloud base without us getting the chance to take a photo.  there was no visible light refraction from the clouds.
content.summary: 8-10 orange glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking to my truck and observed what seemed to be a star that had a little bit of a cooler/not usual color to it. i looked down to open my truck door and upon looking back up, found the star-like light was gone.
 i thought that since i was looking up through the branches of a tree that was starting to get spring buds on it, this disappearance may have been a trick of the light disappearing behind some branches. but as i looked carefully into the sky, found no light where i could swear i had just seen one.
  i walked back toward my truck carefully trying to remember and analyze what i thought i just seen, and when i looked up again, saw the exact same light in the same place, this time blinking once before completely disappearing. 
  not the most dramatic sighting ever, but decided to report as this matched the description of a sighting that occurred a half-hour earlier in new hampshire. they saw their thing in the southern sky and i saw mine in pennsylvania in the northern sky.
content.summary: Star like object suddenly appearing and disapearing

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the livingroom watching a movie. i often glace out the window to look at the stars and the passing planes. at first i thought it was a plane but then i look back and it was stationary. i call my daugther out of bed to come and see this with me outside and she notice 7 more. i imidiatly called a friends to check it out. the light wear extremely bright. a red round one was at it center, mounted by littles yellow lights orbs, all sitted on a green bar. the green bar then became a row of little green orb pulsating to yellow and the top orb above the red one turn to green. it shape look as if it was changing from saucer to triangle to diamond. it moved a little but i didn't see it moved. two of them, the bigger ones, alots of activities light changing colors and shape, while the other ones red light in the center pulsating and 4 greens light forming a diamond wear kinda fading away slowly and coming back (for about an hour). the most active ones for about 1:30. my feelings.. wow! i mean i know of them but to see a live display was sensationel! my daugther was a little afraid, and my landlord was like me in "awe". the whole show lasted about 2 hours. i didn't see them disapear, while taking to my landlord about the sighting we turn to my 10 years old daughter.. she said she saw a bright white light and 'pouf!' they wear gone!
content.summary: 8 stationarys bright lights near and around orion'betl.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my home on the computer when my cat scratched for me to let him in..I lookedand it was 1005pm...I stepped out onto my front porch and looked up the street as i always do..Looked to my left and saw a very bright star over the treeline but it was flashing many colors..Odd...Got my binoculars and saw it was really bright and flashing..We hardly ever have planes overhead but there were three heading in the direction..I watched as the planes got closer it blinked out..I was so happy...Then out of my peripheral view something caught my eye and it was another flashing light just like the first only now closer to me but in the "north" position which is facing forward on my porch..Which put it over tarboro or rocky mount. i kept watching until it got too cold..Looked out the window until it blinked out 16 more mintues.
content.summary: I let my cat inside and saw a bright bright star..But it was changing color radily..And a plane was in the area..Totally different.
Retired pilot witnesses 4 objects north of alliance, ohio.

content.detailedDescription: I went out to check on animals at 10 pm. to the south, i observed what i first thought to be two stars low in the horizon (about 25 degrees above horizon. it is a very clear night. i thought it was unusual to see two bright stars this low on the horizon so i watched them. they pulsated in color from white, green, blue and red very quickly. over the space of 15 minutes, i observed these objects make sudden changes in elevation while moving to the left and right. they did not move in unison or any kind of pattern. i was a bit frightened when i saw one of them suddenly decend and bank sharply to the right and then to the left. then it just stayed stationary. remarkable. at this point i called to my step son and he observed the objects while they were stationary which wasn't very interesting to him. planes do not fly like this. the best i can decribe the movement is that they were like a helicopter's movement but at a considerably higher speed. it's difficult to judge the distance but i estimate that it was at lease one mile. one of them appeared to be closer than the other. there were two other aircraft in the area, one during the event and one shortly after. there is a flight path below mt. monadnock to our south and i'm occustomed to seeing aircraft in the area. i have to say that i was a bit anxious about what i saw. my heart was pounding
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two star like flickering objects abruptly changed direction to south
